title: Fender Telecaster Električna Kitara
description: Električne kitare za vse stile igranja.
longDescription: Električne kitare, primerne za širok nabor glasbenih zvrsti, od rocka in bluesa do countryja in popa. Izdelane iz kakovostnih materialov z različnimi vrstami magnetov (single-coil, humbucker) za raznolike zvoke.

en.title: Fender Telecaster  Electric Guitar
en.description: Electric guitars for all playing styles.
en.longDescription: Electric guitars suitable for a wide range of musical genres, from rock and blues to country and pop. Made from quality materials with various pickups (single-coil, humbucker) for diverse tones.

title: Martin Akustična Kitara
description: Akustične kitare z jasnim zvokom in vrhunsko izdelavo.
longDescription: Akustične kitare z masivnimi zgornjimi ploščami in skrbno izbranimi vrstami lesa za čist, poln zvok. idealne za začetnike in profesionalce, primerne za igranje različnih zvrsti od folka do popa.

en.title: Martin Acoustic Guitar
en.description: Acoustic guitars with clear sound and top-notch craftsmanship.
en.longDescription: Acoustic guitars featuring solid tops and carefully selected woods for a clear, full-bodied sound. ideal for beginners and professionals, suitable for a variety of styles from folk to pop.

title: Alhambra Klasična Kitara
description: Klasične kitare z najlonskimi strunami za začetnike in profesionalce.
longDescription: Klasične kitare z najlonskimi strunami, primerne za klasično glasbo, flamenco in druge zvrsti. Izdelane iz visokokakovostnega lesa (cedra, palisander) in natančno ročno obdelane za uravnotežen in poln ton.

en.title: Alhambra Classical Guitar
en.description: Classical guitars with nylon strings for beginners and professionals.
en.longDescription: Classical guitars with nylon strings, suitable for classical, flamenco, and other genres. Crafted from high-quality woods (cedar, rosewood) and meticulously handmade for a balanced, full tone.

title: Martin Ukulele
description: Ukulele za zabavo in sprostitev.
longDescription: Ukulele, majhen in prenosljiv instrument s svetlim, veseljem tonom. idealne za začetnike in popotnike, izdelane iz različnih vrst lesa in z najlonskimi strunami.

en.title: Martin Ukulele
en.description: Ukulele for fun and relaxation.
en.longDescription: A small, portable instrument with a bright, cheerful tone. ideal for beginners and travelers, made from various woods with nylon strings.

title: Epiphone Jazz Kitara
description: Jazz kitare za sofisticirane igralce.
longDescription: Jazz kitare z votlim ali pol-votlim telesom, humbucker magneti in toplejšim, polnim tonom. idealen izbor za jazz, blues in fusion glasbenike.

en.title: Epiphone Jazz Guitar
en.description: Jazz guitars for sophisticated players.
en.longDescription: Jazz guitars featuring hollow or semi-hollow bodies, humbucker pickups, and a warmer, fuller tone. ideal for jazz, blues, and fusion musicians.
